resources.string:
1. If you click the Enable box, the service will be run on background.
2. When you choose the caller option, the call will be received in that manner.
3. By choosing the option "Set Delayer for Answering?", you can choose a delay time to response the call.
4. You can choose Either Bluetooth or Loudspeaker through which the call will be received. Otherwise the call will be received without loudspeaker or headset.
5. You can also click the box "Don't answer if in call" to prevent receiving call during a call.

This Application is developed by 
Mohammad Saadi 
Under Supervision of 
Miss Mounota Majid Natasha 
from Webliveit Ltd.
for the purpose of Final year internship work.
This is an experimental work which may be beneficial in the future.
Thank you.
